Movie & Dining: 25% discount up to Rs. 100 on movie ticket booking on BookMyShow. Get up to 15% discount on dining.
Rewards Rate: 1 Reward Point per Rs. 100 you spend on utilities & insurance related spends, and 2 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent elsewhere.
Reward Redemption: The Reward Points are redeemable against an array of categories, and cash back at a rate of 1 Reward Point = Re. 0.25.
Travel: One Free Railway Lounge Access Each Quarter
Domestic Lounge Access: 1 Domestic Lounge Access Every Quarter (4 Each Year)
Insurance Benefits: Personal Accident Cover With RuPay Variant (₹2 Lakh)

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: You get a spend-based waiver in case the annual spend is more than 1,50,000 in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: You get a fuel surcharge waiver of 1% across all HPCL petrol stations in India. This offer valid for transaction up to Rs 4,000/-
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% or a Minimum of ₹500 (Whichever is Higher)

product_details: 1 Reward Point per Rs. 100 you spent on utilities & insurance-related spends.
2 Reward Points per Rs. 100 you spend (except Fuel).
Earn up to 10,000 bonus RPs annually under the Milestone Program.
Get 1 complimentary domestic lounge access every quarter.
Get 1 complimentary railway lounge pass every quarter.
Enjoy up to 25% discount on movie ticket booking on BookMyShow and INOX.
